amendment.description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce funding for the Higher Education Program by $2,767,239,000, and transfer the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for Higher Education by $2,767,239,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 354 (Roll no. 656).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 354 (Roll no. 656).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
